verses.verse: These<WH428> are the statutes<WH2706> and judgments,<WH4941> which<WH834> you shall observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> in the land,<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of your fathers<WH1> gives<WH5414> you to possess<WH3423> it, all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> that you live<WH2416> on the earth.<WH127>

You shall utterly destroy<WH6> all<WH3605> the places,<WH4725> wherein<WH834> <WH8033> the nations<WH1471> which<WH834> you shall possess<WH3423> served<WH5647> their gods,<WH430> on the high<WH7311> mountains,<WH2022> and on the hills,<WH1389> and under<WH8478> every<WH3605> green<WH7488> tree:<WH6086>

And you shall overthrow<WH5422> their altars,<WH4196> and break<WH7665> their pillars,<WH4676> and burn<WH8313> their groves<WH842> with fire;<WH784> and you shall hew<WH1438> down<WH1438> the graven<WH6456> images of their gods,<WH430> and destroy<WH6> the names<WH8034> of them out of that place.<WH4725>
You shall not do<WH6213> so<WH3651> to the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

But to the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> out of all<WH3605> your tribes<WH7626> to put<WH7760> his name<WH8034> there,<WH8033> even to his habitation<WH7933> shall you seek,<WH1875> and thither<WH8033> you shall come:<WH935>

And thither<WH8033> you shall bring<WH935> your burnt<WH5930> offerings, and your sacrifices,<WH2077> and your tithes,<WH4643> and heave<WH8641> offerings of your hand,<WH3027> and your vows,<WH5088> and your freewill<WH5071> offerings, and the firstborn<WH1062> of your herds<WH1241> and of your flocks:<WH6629>

And there<WH8033> you shall eat<WH398> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and you shall rejoice<WH8055> in all<WH3605> that you put<WH4916> your hand<WH3027> to, you and your households,<WH1004> wherein<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has blessed<WH1288> you.
You shall not do<WH6213> after all<WH3605> the things that we do<WH6213> here<WH6311> this day,<WH3117> every man<WH376> whatever<WH3605> is right<WH3477> in his own eyes.<WH5869>
For you are not as yet<WH5704> <WH6258> come<WH935> to the rest<WH4496> and to the inheritance,<WH5159> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you.

But when you go<WH5674> over<WH5674> Jordan,<WH3383> and dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives you to inherit,<WH5157> and when he gives you rest<WH5117> from all<WH3605> your enemies<WH341> round<WH5439> about, so that you dwell<WH3427> in safety;<WH983>

Then there shall be a place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> to cause his name<WH8034> to dwell<WH7931> there;<WH8033> thither<WH8033> shall you bring<WH935> all<WH3605> that I command<WH6680> you; your burnt<WH5930> offerings, and your sacrifices,<WH2077> your tithes,<WH4643> and the heave<WH8641> offering<WH8641> of your hand,<WH3027> and all<WH3605> your choice<WH4005> vows<WH5088> which<WH834> you vow<WH5087> to the LORD:<WH3068>

And you shall rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> you, and your sons,<WH1121> and your daughters,<WH1323> and your menservants,<WH5650> and your maidservants,<WH519> and the Levite<WH3881> that is within your gates;<WH8179> for as much<WH3588> as he has no<WH369> part<WH2506> nor inheritance<WH5159> with you.
Take heed<WH8104> to yourself that you offer<WH5927> not your burnt<WH5930> offerings in every<WH3605> place<WH4725> that you see:<WH7200>

But in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall choose<WH977> in one<WH259> of your tribes,<WH7626> there<WH8033> you shall offer<WH5927> your burnt<WH5930> offerings, and there<WH8033> you shall do<WH6213> all<WH3605> that I command<WH6680> you.

Notwithstanding<WH7535> you may kill<WH2076> and eat<WH398> flesh<WH1320> in all<WH3605> your gates,<WH8179> whatever<WH3605> your soul<WH5315> lusts<WH183> after, according to the blessing<WH1293> of the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> which<WH834> he has given<WH5414> you: the unclean<WH2931> and the clean<WH2889> may eat<WH398> thereof, as of the roebuck,<WH6643> and as of the hart.<WH354>
Only<WH7535> you shall not eat<WH398> the blood;<WH1818> you shall pour<WH8210> it on the earth<WH776> as water.<WH4325>

You may<WH3201> not eat<WH398> within your gates<WH8179> the tithe<WH4643> of your corn,<WH1715> or of your wine,<WH8492> or of your oil,<WH3323> or the firstborn<WH1062> of your herds<WH1241> or of your flock,<WH6629> nor any<WH3605> of your vows<WH5088> which<WH834> you vow,<WH5087> nor your freewill<WH5071> offerings, or heave<WH8641> offering<WH8641> of your hand:<WH3027>

But you must eat<WH398> them before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose,<WH977> you, and your son,<WH1121> and your daughter,<WH1323> and your manservant,<WH5650> and your maidservant,<WH519> and the Levite<WH3881> that is within your gates:<WH8179> and you shall rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> in all<WH3605> that you put<WH4916> your hands<WH3027> to.
Take heed<WH8104> to yourself that you forsake<WH5800> not the Levite<WH3881> as long<WH3117> as you live<WH3117> on the earth.<WH127>

When<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall enlarge<WH7337> your border,<WH1366> as he has promised<WH1696> you, and you shall say,<WH559> I will eat<WH398> flesh,<WH1320> because<WH3588> your soul<WH5315> longs<WH183> to eat<WH398> flesh;<WH1320> you may eat<WH398> flesh,<WH1320> whatever<WH3605> your soul<WH5315> lusts<WH183> after.

If<WH3588> the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has chosen<WH977> to put<WH7760> his name<WH8034> there<WH8033> be too<WH7368> far<WH7368> from you, then you shall kill<WH2076> of your herd<WH1241> and of your flock,<WH6629> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> has given<WH5414> you, as I have commanded<WH6680> you, and you shall eat<WH398> in your gates<WH8179> whatever<WH3605> your soul<WH5315> lusts<WH183> after.
Even<WH389> as the roebuck<WH6643> and the hart<WH354> is eaten,<WH398> so<WH3651> you shall eat<WH398> them: the unclean<WH2931> and the clean<WH2889> shall eat<WH398> of them alike.<WH3162>
Only<WH7535> be sure<WH2388> that you eat<WH398> not the blood:<WH1818> for the blood<WH1818> is the life;<WH5315> and you may not eat<WH398> the life<WH5315> with the flesh.<WH1320>
You shall not eat<WH398> it; you shall pour<WH8210> it on the earth<WH776> as water.<WH4325>

You shall not eat<WH398> it; that it may go well<WH3190> with you, and with your children<WH1121> after<WH310> you, when<WH3588> you shall do<WH6213> that which is right<WH3477> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD.<WH3068>

Only<WH7535> your holy<WH6944> things which<WH834> you have,<WH1961> and your vows,<WH5088> you shall take,<WH5375> and go<WH935> to the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall choose:<WH977>

And you shall offer<WH6213> your burnt<WH5930> offerings, the flesh<WH1320> and the blood,<WH1818> on the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> your God:<WH430> and the blood<WH1818> of your sacrifices<WH2077> shall be poured<WH8210> out on the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and you shall eat<WH398> the flesh.<WH1320>

Observe<WH8104> and hear<WH8085> all<WH3605> these<WH428> words<WH1697> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you, that it may go well<WH3190> with you, and with your children<WH1121> after<WH310> you for ever,<WH5769> when<WH3588> you do<WH6213> that which is good<WH2896> and right<WH3477> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

When<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall cut<WH3772> off the nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> you, where<WH834> <WH8033> you go<WH935> to possess<WH3423> them, and you succeed<WH3423> them, and dwell<WH3427> in their land;<WH776>

Take heed<WH8104> to yourself that you be not snared<WH5367> by following<WH310> them, after<WH310> that they be destroyed<WH8045> from before<WH6440> you; and that you inquire<WH1875> not after their gods,<WH430> saying,<WH559> How<WH349> did these<WH428> nations<WH1471> serve<WH5647> their gods?<WH430> even<WH1571> so<WH3651> will I do<WH6213> likewise.<WH3651>

You shall not do<WH6213> so<WH3651> to the LORD<WH3068> your God:<WH430> for every<WH3605> abomination<WH8441> to the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> he hates,<WH8130> have they done<WH6213> to their gods;<WH430> for even<WH1571> their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> they have burnt<WH8313> in the fire<WH784> to their gods.<WH430>
What<WH853> thing<WH1697> soever<WH834> I command<WH6680> you, observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> it: you shall not add<WH3254> thereto,<WH5921> nor<WH3808> diminish<WH1639> from it.
